name: Fall Guys Paper
description:
FALL GUYS PAPER

by JediTech10

Fall In the Fun with Fall Guys Paper (Beta Program)

OUT NOW 28.06.21

====INSTRUCTIONS=====

Game is pretty simple, You can change your fall guys colour or skin, you can change volume in game, and from there press button PLAY on menu screen.

=======NOTES=========

The Current Game is still in BETA

If Glitches or Bugs are found please report

========================

IN PROGRESS!!!!!

There may be errors because its still being coded.

=======LEVELS========

- Block Party

- Door Dash

-Slime Climb

-Hexagon 

- Fruit Chute is coming soon

===SAVE AND LOAD======

Press SAVE button after playing to get two access codes, one for Kudos and Another for Crowns

When Loading into a new game press load and use access codes given in previous games
